page.title: 20Strathmiglo - Class of '85
page.content:
The work for the Domesday Project was done by the Primary 7 children at Strathmiglo Primary School, five girls and five boys. To begin with, they thoroughly enjoyed what they were doing.It took them out of school and brought them into contact with many local people who were interested in what was going on and were keen to contribute.Later, as the end of term approached with its many distractions and deadlines which had to be met,the novelty began to wear off.Editing screen pages became a bit of a bind. Everyone was glad when the final touches had been made.
Benjamin Andrew Sara Ann Atkin Michael Bean Wendy Boyle Hamish Kerr Louise Leonard Bryan Orr Deborah Morgan Barrie Robertson Christine Scott
